items.sentence: Tom bought a pair of leather motorcycle gloves.
I remembered I was late and stepped on the gas.
If you don\'t want to sing, you don\'t have to.
Did Tom remember to do what we asked him to do?
Did Tom tell Mary where John spent the weekend?
Tom won\'t be able to solve his problems alone.
Tom won\'t be the only one without an umbrella.
Tom won\'t have to do that again, I assure you.
Tom would do anything to get Mary\'s attention.
Tom advised Mary not to go to Boston with John.
Tom advised Mary not to stay out late at night.
Tom advised Mary to take her umbrella with her.
Tom almost always helps Mary with her homework.
Tom always eats breakfast cereal without sugar.
Tom was very angry and wouldn\'t speak to Mary.
Tom was your boyfriend at one time, wasn\'t he?
I couldn\'t have done that without Tom\'s help.
I couldn\'t have done this without Tom\'s help.
I couldn\'t have stayed even if I\'d wanted to.
Tom crossed the road without looking both ways.
